issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI -> Views ->image views -->animated.

h5.Actual Result:
1. We do not see any animations & buttons are cutoff at the bottom.

h5.Expected Result:
1. We should see respective animation & buttons should not be cutoff.
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: BaseUI > Views > image views > animated; no animation is seen & buttons are cutoff to the bottom
fields.environment:
